fields_of_interest: Agriculture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Environment, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: Agriculture, Rural Development, CAP, Education and training, Sustainable development, Research and Innovation.
organisation_name: European Forum for Agricultural and Rural Advisory Services (EUFRAS)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Structured Dialogue with European Structural and Investment Funds' partners group of experts#E03226#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3226#Member#C
goals__remit: Improving quality, effectiveness and efficiency  of agricultural and rural advisors’ work aimed at supporting farming families, farmers local groups agricultural organisations and individuals involved in agricultural and rural development and addressing of the current and emerging problems (economic, environmental and social).
relevant_communication: EUFRAS is in regular contact with EU officials and MEPs and hold events where EU officials are invited as speakers.
